content: उपजीवक, --विन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Living upon, subsisting by (<ab>instr.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab>); जातिमात्रोपजीविनां <ls>Ms. 12. 114</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">8. 20</ls>; नानापण्योपजीविनां <ls n="Ms.">9. 257</ls>; द्यूतोपजीव्यस्मि <ls>Mk. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Living under, depending upon, subject to, a dependant, servant ({%--<ab>m.</ab>%}); भीमकांतैर्नृपगुणैः स बभूवोपजीविनाम् <ls>R. 1. 16</ls>; अस्मद्° <ls>K. 61.</ls> --कं Means of subsistence, profession.
